title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes does not show busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table during the export Zip process, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) and there is no busy cursor shown.
EB: During the update of the checkboxes, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the application is processing the request.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open a workspace with many projects.2. Perform an export Zip operation.3. Select all projects.4. Choose the desired file types.5. Click on the 'OK' button.
